channel.title: Multiplayer on Gasimo
channel.description: Recent content in Multiplayer on Gasimo

item.title: SCP: Classified Site
item.description: SCP Classified Site is a Unity Crossplatform Multiplayer game I co-founded and developed alongside Aizyka. Notable things I have developed for CS is the Spherecast-based Interaction System, Inventory & Item Logic and Architecture and Random Map Generator. In the first year after release the game obtained over 1 milion downloads from the Play Store alone.
